headerSnippet.value: Expert Window Cleaning always do an amazing job! Very satisfied - Thank you!
headerSnippet.instructions: Take a small snippet from the review.

value.body: Will did an amazing job! On time and very professional. I highly recommend him!
Expert Window Cleaning always do an amazing job! Very satisfied - Thank you!
Will is on time, efficient, polite and does a great job.  He's been coming to our home for the last 5 years.
I will continue to recommend you to people as we are very pleased with your work!!!!
Will did a great job.  I would definitely recommend Expert Window Cleaning.
Will is great to work with. We will use him again.

review.instructions: Use available information to create 2-6 testimonials in the testimonials array. Use the provided icon for all authors

example.body: The body for the first testimonial goes here. It should be a short paragraph about what the person is saying about the company.

author.name: Name of the first person
author.source: Source of the review. For example, Google, Facebook, etc.
